name: Create a booking (POST /booking)

testSteps.description: 1: Create a booking (POST /booking) ({firstname=Jim, lastname=Brown, totalprice=111, depositpaid=true, checkin=43101, checkout=43466, additionalneeds=Breakfast, statusCode=200})

children.description: Given the Booking API is available

When the user creates a booking
| firstname | lastname | totalprice | depositpaid | checkin | checkout | additionalneeds | statusCode |
| Jim | Brown | 111 | true | 43101 | 43466 | Breakfast | 200 |
Then the response status code should be success
And the response should contain a bookingid

testSteps.description: 2: Create a booking (POST /booking) ({firstname=Ana, lastname=White, totalprice=250, depositpaid=false, checkin=43586, checkout=43595, additionalneeds=Dinner, statusCode=200})

children.description: Given the Booking API is available

When the user creates a booking
| firstname | lastname | totalprice | depositpaid | checkin | checkout | additionalneeds | statusCode |
| Ana | White | 250 | false | 43586 | 43595 | Dinner | 200 |
Then the response status code should be success
And the response should contain a bookingid
